concept.title: Attendance
concept.shortdesc: The syllabus should explain the concept of attendance as it relates to your class as an online course.

conbody.p:
The relevant information for attendance could be included as a subsection to the policies section and should include:
A statement that explains the concept of attendance as it relates to your class as an online course

example.title: Example
example.p: Because this course is in an asynchronous online format, there is no concept of attendance. You conduct your studies at your own time and pace (within the parameters of our deadlines). The lesson schedule and deadlines are posted well in advance of their actual dates. Therefore, you have time to complete work by all deadlines even if you are sick for a day or two.
